about_the_game:
Bill is going through a tough time in his life, he lost meaning and purpose.
But one night, a UFO crashes in front of his little home in the woods.
The passenger is an unconscious baby alien.
You are his only chance of survival!

Key Features :

  • Collect Resources

    Plant and grow your own vegetables.
    Grow anything you like to cook with an increasing tech system to make farming easier and easier.
    • Interact with everything

      Everything is interactable in the game, lamps, radio, tv, and many other machines
    • Crafting

      Everything you need in the game is craftable.
      Collect items in the forest and craft from specialized crafting tables: Woodcraft, Kitchen, Electronic, Forge, Chemistry
    • Building

      Create new rooms or utilities and place them where you want.
      Make your house unique and as big as you like.
    • Buy and sell items
      Buy online broken devices, restore them with new parts, and sell them for a better price.
    • Restoring
      Take any broken item and give it a new life using your master skills.
    • Take care of the baby alien and yourself
      Sleep, eat well and entertain yourself, it's not only about work.
    • Decorate your home
      Use plants, lamps, paintings, and posters to decorate your home and make it as cozy as you like.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11, 64-bit versions only.
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, and DX12-capable GPUs

short_description: You are a genius at crafting. He is a stranded Alien baby who crashed in your garden. His survival depends on you! Craft tools and furniture, Upgrade your house, Farm your food, organize, and personalize your home. Help a baby alien to survive on earth and find out more about it
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Simplified Chinese, Turkish, Portuguese - Brazil
